thread.section_title: eTeacherBiblical Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eTeacherBiblical | eteacherbiblical.com
thread.title: Gabriella

author: Gabriella
title: Gabriella
text:
I liked the lessons while i was able to take part in . Unfortunately my job changed at the meantime so i'm not able to take part in anymore . I download the recordings and i have the book and the double language Bible , so i can learn in my own time . Malka is a great teacher and very helpful . I can recommend this course to anyone who is interested in .
Kind regards : Gabriella
